overview:
Elle Zhang is a marketing professional who has extensive expertise in search engine optimization, PPC, social media and email communications.

She has worked on a variety of projects ranging from $3000 to $1M and serviced clients including both Fortune 500 and small businesses.

One of her small business clients is DSA (lightboxes.com) - a light box manufacturer located in LA. To check out her work, go to http://lightboxes.com and see how she makes the best use of an open source shopping cart software with minimum budget.

She now has her own firm providing marketing consulting services to clients in the states and in China also.

She regularly writes blogs about business and social problems at www.spicyspirit.com/our-blog.
